thread.title_full: Great experience staying at this hotel - Review of Hotel Villa d'Estrees, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ValerieOg
title: Great experience staying at this hotel
text: We (three sister in laws) were attending a family wedding in Paris and loved this small hotel which was in a very central and lively area of the city. The staff was wonderful, the concierge, Willy, helped us with everything that we needed, from making appointments for our hair, recommending restaurants, shops, making the reservation and showing us on the map where everything was and how to get there. We had a wonderful time and hope that we will go back again.
